  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3427</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3427</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Aula virtual : Els elements de la partitura</string>
            <string language="en">Virtual classroom: Parts of the score</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtuelles Klassenzimmer: Teile der Kerbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Salle de classe virtuelle : Parties des 
points</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sala de aula virtual: Partes da contagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aula virtuale: Parti del segno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικονική τάξη: Μέρη του αποτελέσματος</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Apartat de la pàgina Aula virtual que presenta un glossari de termes relacionats amb els símbols i els elements gràfics del llenguatge musical.</string>
            <string language="en">Glossary of terms for the symbols and graphic elements to be found in a musical score.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glossar der Bezeichnungen, damit die Symbole und 
die Graphikelemente in einer musikalischen Kerbe gefunden werden 
können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Glossaire des limites pour que les symboles et 
les éléments de graphique soient trouvés dans des points musicaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Glossário dos termos para que os símbolos e os 
elementos do gráfico sejam encontrados em uma contagem musical.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Glossario dei termini affinchè i simboli e gli 
elementi del grafico siano trovati in un segno musicale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γλωσσάρι όρων για τα σύμβολα και τα γραφικά στοιχεία 
που βρίσκονται σε ένα μουσικό αποτέλεσμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
